程序包 nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.domain

类 Domain

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.domain.Domain
public class Domain
extends java.lang.Object
The game class that handles the backend.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器 
    构造器 说明
    Domain​(java.lang.String levelName)
    The Domain initializes with a board from Persistence, this is the only req. for the Domain to launch.

    • anotherEnemyInThisSpace

      public static Actor anotherEnemyInThisSpace​(java.util.List<Actor> actors, Coordinate moveToCoordinate)
      Simple utility method to check a location for enemy actors.
      参数:
      moveToCoordinate -
      返回:
      - returns null for no enemies, otherwise returns the enemy.

    • randomlyMoveActor

      public static Direction randomlyMoveActor()
      Side method that handles random movement. This is called by a tick event in app for other actors/enemies.

      When you step on an item you interact with the item.
